name: Tom Parker
testimonial: Great service they showed up on time and carefully loaded all my machines. Everything was done so quickly with no stress. Highly recomend for anyone needing heavy machines moved.

name: Vikram Mehta
testimonial: I had to offload my dads workshop and was worried about the big machines. This servce was great, they did all the lifting, even the small parts. Very fast and cautious. Would defintely use again.

name: Dave Thompson
testimonial: Very profesional and they offered a great price for my ML7 and ML10 lathes. They arrived on time and finished early - great servce and nice people!
